import { eventWrapper } from "@testing-library/user-event/dist/utils"; import React, { Component } from "react"; import './Form.css' class Form extends Component { constructor() { super() this.state = { charName: '', concept: '', playerName: '', image: '', brawn: 1, agility: 1, intellegence: 1, wit: 1, charm: 1, presence: 1, attributesTotal: 0, maxHealth: 0, currentHealth: 0, healthy: true, injured: false, unconscious: false, key: Date.now() } } handleChange = (event) => { event.preventDefault() this.setState( {[event.target.name]: event.target.value}) this.restrictOP() } stepUp = (event) => { event.preventDefault() let total = this.state.brawn + this.state.agility + this.state.intellegence + this.state.wit + this.state.charm + this.state.presence console.log(total); let n = this.state[event.target.name] n++ if (n <= 4 && total < 13) { this.setState( {...this.state, [event.target.name]: n} ) } } stepDown = (event) => { event.preventDefault() let n = this.state[event.target.name] n-- if (n >= 1) { this.setState({...this.state, [event.target.name]: n}) } } restrictOP = () => { if (this.brawn + this.agility + this.intellegence + this.wit + this.charm + this.presence <= 13) { console.log("test"); } } submitPC = (event) => { event.preventDefault() this.props.addPC(this.state) } render() { return (
Choose an emoji: Add seven points to Attributes:
{this.state.brawn <= 4 && } Brawn: {this.state.brawn}
Agility: {this.state.agility}
Intellegence: {this.state.intellegence}
Wit: {this.state.wit}
Charm: {this.state.charm}
Presence: {this.state.presence}
) } } export default Form
